pr_title: [Spark load] Add spark etl cluster and cluster manager

merge 0206
Fix update spark etl cluster bug

timeline.bodyText: If there are properties which are not valid, better to throw exception to let users know
timeline.author: imay

timeline.bodyText: If the resource type has been resolved, better to save it as a class member.

imay
imay

timeline.bodyText: should give comments for these functions to help others know how to implement them
timeline.author: imay

timeline.bodyText: Enum class has a method valueOf(String), which is same as this fromString()
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: CaseInsensitive in fromString function and return UNKNOWN if resourceType does not exist
replies.author: wyb

timeline.author: morningman

timeline.bodyText: I think this procNode can be created when constructing this class.
timeline.author: morningman

timeline.bodyText:
I think a concurrentMap is enough. And the lock is only used when creating the resource,
to make "create resource" and "write edit log" atomic.

morningman
